duties_responsibilities.duty: Prospect for new business and network to grow the new product portfolio
Generate new sales and expand existing client base
Have a strong understanding of the GMP process and what is involved in GMP manufacturing
Speak with customers on a technical level
Work with a high degree of independence, yet work well in a team

education_certification.credential: BA/BS degree in the Life Sciences (Molecular Biology, Biochemistry, Genetics, or related field)
